Detailed Description

Smart pointer for OpenGL 2D texture memory with reference counting.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum cv::ogl::Texture2D::Format
Enumerator
NONE 
DEPTH_COMPONENT 

Depth.

RGB 

Red, Green, Blue.

RGBA 

Red, Green, Blue, Alpha.
